page.title: 05Home Life, Pitreavie
page.content: Home Life Style, Pitreavie. In the morning the boy wakened by his electric alarm clock went into the bathroom, washed and used an electric toothbrush. He got changed and listened to his radio. A teasmade had already made tea for him and mum has made taost in the electric toaster and cooked eggs in the Microwave (ultrafast). Dad has a radio telephone to contact people directly from his car.......... At school the boy used a computer. He did baking in the afternoon. After school he played on his own computer and watched television. After tea he played with mini arcade games before going to bed. Fraser Graham.
